testcase.name: verify Subtraction
testcase.system-out: Given I have two numbers 10 and 5...........................................passed When I subtract the second number from the first number.....................passed Then the result should be 5.................................................passed

testcase.name: verify Division
testcase.system-out: Given I have two numbers 10 and 5...........................................passed When I divide the first number by the second number.........................passed Then the result should be 2.................................................passed
